snippet.title: The Aching Aversion Trailer
snippet.description:
A 3D RPGMaker Horror game about exploring a weird bunker.

The bunker will have different horrors waiting in it depending on how you broke into it!

7 different routes to 9 unique endings!
An ending collecting game!

Atmospheric audio and a unique 3D art style come together to create an experience you will remember!


Everyone has seen it at some point, it doesn't matter where, it doesn't matter when, the bunker has invaded your mind at some point in your life.
No one has ever entered it...
And if the inside has never been seen, how can one be so sure that the inside really exists.

Whether it is a safe room, an armoured bunker, a torture dungeon or just empty space depends on the history of the entrant.

Wishlist The Aching Aversion on Steam now!.
